name: timtara
overview:
timtara.com, India’s No.1 Online Electronics Retailer, with a Private Label named Buzz, was launched in May 2010 with a simple & focused thought that shopping should be fun & entertaining.

timtara.com is having a huge range of electronic gadgets such as LCDs, Cameras, Mobiles, Laptops & Peripherals, Health Care, Watches, Gaming Items, Kitchen & Home Appliances. All these are from the leading brands of the world. timtara showcases 100% genuine manufacturer warranty products.

Within 7 months of its launch, it was selected as India’s No. 1 ecommerce website in user experience & one of 20 hottest e-commerce start ups based on research carried out by Dataquest & SapientNitro, one of the leading interactive agencies in the world, The research covered initiatives launched in last 4 years.

Good products, easy to understand details, ‘peace of mind’ quality, super fast delivery, and long relationship - at timtara.com. we simply call it DELIGHT.

DELIGHT is a core philosophy of timtara.com. Amazing products, seamless interface of the website, timely delivery of goods give that ‘peace of mind’ to timtara customers and helps in attaining a long relationship with their partners.

timtara deals with 500+ leading brands such as Apple, Samsung, Philips, HP Sony, Inalsa, Panasonic, Nikon , Acer, Dell, Canon, HTC, Bajaj, Nokia, Motorola, Lenovo, LG, Whirlpool, IFB Global, Mitashi, Sandisk, Disney, Dr. Morpen, Omron & the list go on…

timtara.com caters to 2700+ cities across India and is a “VeriSgn” secure website that makes one’s shopping safe & secure. timtara offers convenient payment options like: Credit/Debit Card, Net banking, Cash card payment, Mobile payment, Cash on delivery etc.
